issue.title: [Python][C++] index_in_meta_binary/is_in_meta_binary should not show up in functions list
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13949](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13949). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The index_in_meta_binary function is an implementation detail and should not show up in the list of functions.

The same also applies to is_in_meta_binary
